articles.title: First deportees arrive in Rwanda as part of a deal with Washington - africanews.com
articles.description: A government spokesperson says the first group of seven people arrived in Kigali in mid-August.
articles.content:
Rwanda says a first group of seven deportees from the United States arrived in the country in mid-August under an agreement with Washington.
A government spokesperson added that each case was vetted… [+1165 chars]
